text.p: Click on a column header to sort the table.

ROW.title: Additional model info
ROW.tagdesc: Information about the ethnicity and other facts of the model(s) in a model-released image.

ROW.title: Code of featured Organisation
ROW.tagdesc: Code from controlled vocabulary for identifying the organisation or company which is featured in the image.

ROW.title: Controlled Vocabulary Term
ROW.tagdesc: A term to describe the content of the image by a value from a Controlled Vocabulary.

ROW.title: Model age
ROW.tagdesc: Age of the human model(s) at the time this image was taken in a model released image.

ROW.title: Name of featured Organisation
ROW.tagdesc: Name of the organisation or company which is featured in the image.

ROW.title: Person shown
ROW.tagdesc: Name of a person shown in the image.

ROW.title: Digital Image Identifier
ROW.tagdesc: Globally unique identifier for this digital image. It is created and applied by the creator of the digital image at the time of its creation. this value shall not be changed after that time.

ROW.title: Physical type of original photo
ROW.tagdesc: The type of the source digital file.

ROW.title: Event
ROW.tagdesc: Names or describes the specific event at which the photo was taken.

ROW.title: Maximum available height
ROW.tagdesc: The maximum available height in pixels of the original photo from which this photo has been derived by downsizing.

ROW.title: Maximum available width
ROW.tagdesc: The maximum available width in pixels of the original photo from which this photo has been derived by downsizing.

ROW.title: Registry Entry
ROW.tagdesc: Both a Registry Item Id and a Registry Organisation Id to record any registration of this digital image with a registry.

ROW.title: Registry Entry-Item Identifier
ROW.tagdesc: A unique identifier created by a registry and applied by the creator of the digital image. This value shall not be changed after being applied. This identifier is linked to a corresponding Registry Organisation Identifier.

ROW.title: Registry Entry-Organisation Identifier
ROW.tagdesc: An identifier for the registry which issued the corresponding Registry Image Id.

ROW.title: IPTC Fields Last Edited
ROW.tagdesc: The date and optionally time when any of the IPTC photo metadata fields has been last edited.

ROW.title: Location shown
ROW.tagdesc: A location shown in the image.

ROW.title: Location Created
ROW.tagdesc: The location the photo was taken.

ROW.title: Location-City
ROW.tagdesc: Name of the city of a location.

ROW.title: Location-Country ISO-Code
ROW.tagdesc: The ISO code of a country of a location.

ROW.title: Location-Country Name
ROW.tagdesc: The name of a country of a location.

ROW.title: Location-Province/State
ROW.tagdesc: The name of a subregion of a country - a province or state - of a location.

ROW.title: Location-Sublocation
ROW.tagdesc: Name of a sublocation. This sublocation name could either be the name of a sublocation to a city or the name of a well known location or (natural) monument outside a city.

ROW.title: Location-World Region
ROW.tagdesc: The name of a world region of a location.

ROW.title: Artwork or object in the image
ROW.tagdesc: A set of metadata about artwork or an object in the image.

ROW.title: Artwork or object-Copyright notice
ROW.tagdesc: Contains any necessary copyright notice for claiming the intellectual property for artwork or an object in the image and should identify the current owner of the copyright of this work with associated intellectual property rights.

ROW.title: Artwork or object-Creator
ROW.tagdesc: Contains the name of the artist who has created artwork or an object in the image. In cases where the artist could or should not be identified the name of a company or organisation may be appropriate.

ROW.title: Artwork or object-Date Created
ROW.tagdesc: Designates the date and optionally the time the artwork or object in the image was created. This relates to artwork or objects with associated intellectual property rights.

ROW.title: Artwork or object-Source
ROW.tagdesc: The organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in the image for inventory purposes.

ROW.title: Artwork or object-Source inventory number
ROW.tagdesc: The inventory number issued by the organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in the image.

ROW.title: Artwork or object-Title
ROW.tagdesc: A reference for the artwork or object in the image.
